name: Alcott Marketing Science
description:
Alcott Marketing Science is a results-focused marketing agency that moves the meter for its clients through a combination of superior strategy and analytics, relentless innovation, and a strong commitment to partnership.
The team is committed to ensuring that no stakeholder is exploited for the benefit of another—clients, vendors, employees, and the community are all treated fairly and with respect—and to donate at least 50% of profits every year to non-profit groups and worthwhile causes.
